articles.title: About me
articles.contents:
As a part of my journey towards learning Data Science, I have created this website/blog to showcase my projects, articles and other good stuff. If you have any questions about any of the content on this site, feel free to contact me at alex@dernild.dk.
My name is Alexander Dernild, I’m 23 years old and from Denmark. I have a bachelor’s degree in Sociology and Cultural Analysis and I’m currently pursuing a master’s degree in Data Science, with the specialization Human Informatics at University of Southern Denmark.
Academic interests
My academic interests include but are not limited to: Cultural Sociology, Sociology of Everyday Life, Environmental Sociology, Computational Linguistics, Computational methods for Social Sciences & Philosophical underpinnings of Social Sciences research.


        
            
                MSc Data Science
                2020 - present
            
            I'm currently pursuing a master's in Data Science - Human Informatics at University of Southern Denmark.
        
    

    
    
        
            
                BSc Cultural Sociology
                2017 - 2020
            
            I have a bachelor's degree in Sociology and Cultural Analysis from University of Southern Denmark.
